message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CR, cs.DB, cs.CC. 

The paper deals with the problem of private computation in a distributed storage system, which involves information theory (cs.IT) and distributed systems (cs.DS). The privacy aspect of the problem also relates to cryptography (cs.CR). The use of linear codes to encode the information on the databases is a topic in database systems (cs.DB) and coding theory (cs.CC).
